title: Memphis In June
lyrics: Memphis in JuneA shade veranda under Sunday blue skyMemphis in JuneAnd my cousin Miranda she's making a blueberry pieI can see the clock outside a ticking and a tockingEverything so peaceful and dandyI can see my grandmama 'cross the street still a rockingWatching all the neighbours go by oh myMemphis in JuneSweet oleander blowing perfume in the air everywhereUp jumps the moon to make it so much granderIt's paradise honey take my advice honeyCos there's nothing loke old Memphis in June
